definition: moso bamboo (Phyllostachys edulis), used as timber etc

hair/feather/down/wool/mildew/mold/coarse or semifinished/young/raw/careless/unthinking/nervous/scared/(of currency) to devalue or depreciate/classifier for Chinese fractional monetary unit ( = 角[jiao3] , = one-tenth of a yuan or 10 fen 分[fen1])

sentences.english: The structure variance of soil nutrient is bigger than the random variance.
sentences.chinese: 毛竹林土壤养分的结构性变异大于随机变异。

sentences.english: Investigation was carried out for water penetration into moso bamboo (Phyllostachys pubescens), grown in Fuyang, Zhejiang Province.
sentences.chinese: 研究生长于浙江省富阳的毛竹的水分浸入特性。

sentences.english: The profile distribution of different fractions of organic carbon were not altered by intensive practice.
sentences.chinese: 毛竹集约经营未改变各类有机碳的剖面变化特征。

sentences.english: The experimental exploration and research prospect of chemical characteristics' variation of moso bamboo wood were also discussed.
sentences.chinese: 并讨论了毛竹竹材化学特性的研究前景。

sentences.english: Demonstration projects of Phyllostachys pubescens injected with BNP solution were launched in Jing'an County.
sentences.chinese: 靖安县开展了毛竹注射BNP溶液试验示范项目。

sentences.english: You see the stuff looking like cotton fibers is bamboo fibers.
sentences.chinese: 你看那些像棉絮一样的东西是毛竹纤维。

sentences.english: A high-yield technique trial on Phyllostachys pubescens stands has been conducted in Chongyang County of Hebei province.
sentences.chinese: 在湖北省崇阳县进行毛竹林丰产技术试验研究。

sentences.english: The proportion and balance of nutrient elements will influence bamboo yield.
sentences.chinese: 各营养元素之间的比例与平衡对毛竹产量有影响。

sentences.english: The climate comfort degree in Phoebe sheareri community and Cryptomeria fortunei community were much higher than that of Phyllostachys edulis community.
sentences.chinese: 紫楠群落和柳杉群落的气候舒适等级高于毛竹群落。

sentences.english: Phyllostachys heterocycla grew better in lower mountain than middle mountain.
sentences.chinese: 低山较中山更适于毛竹的生长。

sentences.english: It is tender caudex of Mao bamboo that grows in mountains and river valleys.
sentences.chinese: 是毛竹之嫩茎，长于山野河谷之中。

sentences.english: The area of bamboo forest decreased with the increasing slope.
sentences.chinese: 随着坡度的增加，毛竹分布的面积减少。

sentences.english: Phenotypic genetic variation of Phyllostachys edulis cv. pachyloen is stable in its original and introductory places.
sentences.chinese: 厚皮毛竹原产地和引种地表型遗传变异稳定。

sentences.english: The Moso bamboo plantation has an excellent forest hydrological function.
sentences.chinese: 人工毛竹林具有优良的森林水文功能。

definition: Masson pine (Pinus massoniana, Chinese red pine, horsetail pine)
thin bamboo strips used for basket weaving
